# Referências

- McKinney, W. Python for Data Analysis, 3rd Edition, 2022. Open Access: [https://wesmckinney.com/book/](https://wesmckinney.com/book/)
    - 2a edição em português disponível na biblioteca do CCAE-UFPB)

- Grus, Joel. Data Science do Zero. Editora Alta Books, 2021.
    - Disponível na biblioteca virtual da UFPB (Minha Biblioteca)

- Skienna, S. The Data Science Design Manual. Springer, 2017.

- Bruce, P. et al. Practical Statistics for Data Scientists. O’Reilly, 2020
    - Código e datasets: [https://github.com/gedeck/practical-statistics-for-data-scientists](https://github.com/gedeck/practical-statistics-for-data-scientists)

- VanderPlas, J. Python Data Science Handbook. 2022. Open URL: [https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/](https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/)

- Wickhan, H. R for Data Science. Open Access: [http://r4ds.had.co.nz](http://r4ds.had.co.nz)

- Downey, A. Think Stats - Exploratory Data Analysis in Python.
